item.title: Set redirect URL after updated Django model in admin
item.description: Currently if you do a filter or search in list view in admin in Django, after update a row in given list (Django will open edit page). After that model is updated, Django will redirect to list url without keep search or filter condition that you made before. Here is the solution to make Django redirect to previous list view url. Firstly, you need define own ChangeList. from jutil.admin import admin_obj_url from django.

item.title: Debugging Django emails
item.description: Run in terminal: python -m smtpd -n -c DebuggingServer localhost:1025 After that in Django’s settings.py: EMAIL_HOST = 'localhost' EMAIL_HOST_PASSWORD = '' EMAIL_HOST_USER = '' EMAIL_PORT = 1025 EMAIL_USE_SSL = False Then you get all sent email contents printed to terminal:
